resources.string: Field linguists and open source developers have gotten together to create a speech recognizer for low resource language speakers. You can use this application to prepare your Android to guess your speech. You need to read some suggestions and then contact WiFi in order to prepare your sound model. We expect that after reading some training sentences we will have a better result. Because the low resource languages are different from other languages ​​so we do not know how much this application will be useful. You can try it, it is more experimental and used for research, so we can not guarantee that it will be useful. Here's our slide link: http://batumi.github.io Here is our privacy policy: https://www.lingsync.org/privacy.html
Are you sure you want to put this datum in the trash?
. I\'m pretty funny, ey? There were some other options, but I think I\'ll stop there.
Say \"digits\" or \"forecast\" to choose particular example.
Let\'s recognize some digits: say something like \"one two three four five\".
Say something typical to a weather forecast like \"sunny spells on Wednesday\".
